1.「すばらしい！ | これでスタンプが貯まったカードが| <%dM_CardNum: Great! Now you have <%dM_CardNum> cards with|stamps on them...<bw_break>

2.「よし。これで スタンプが貯まったカードが | <%dM_CardNum>枚 に:
Okay. Now you have <%dM_CardNum> of cards|with stamps on them... Then I shall bestow|upon you the promised reward! ... I'll take|
|it...

3.「定められたクエストを こなしてきたようだな。 | よし スタンプを押そう。|<: I've been doing my assigned quests, so...|Okay, I'll get the stamps.<end>

4.「むむっ。オーグリード大陸のカードに | スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！:
... It looks like all the stamps have been|applied to the card on the Aughrid continent.|The continent of Aughrid... By the way, I|
|wonder how Magnus, the servant of Castle|Gartland, is doing? That's a distant cousin|of the Queen's... He was a distant relative|
|of the Queen... who studied politics in this|country under the wise man Rhesenda in her|youth.

5.「むむっ。ウェナ諸島のカードに | スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！|<b:
... It seems all the cards from the Wenatchee|Islands have been stamped! The Wenna Islands.|I trust Lord Meru is in good health? When he|
|was still a member of the Order of the Magi,|he came to this country on a mission. I had|the honor of studying his swordplay.

6.「むむっ。エルトナ大陸のカードに | スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！|<:
... Looks like all the stamps are on the|cards in Eltona! The continent of Eltona...|Has Dr. Hanetzki's research come to fruition?|
|..... I don't know her directly, but I've|read a paper she wrote... I've read some of|her work.

7.「むむっ。ドワチャッカ大陸のカードに | スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！:
... It looks like all the stamps have been|placed on the Dwachaqa continent card! The|Dwachaqa continent... I'd love to adopt their|
|transporter mechanism... The castle and town|of Granzedorra are too large... I'm too old|for this kind of travel...

8.「むむっ。プクランド大陸のカードに | スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！|:
... It looks like all the cards in Pukland|have been stamped! Pukland... I've heard that|there's a wonderful tower there called the|
|Glittering Great Windmill Tower. I'd hoped to|take the whole family to see it, but now I'm|afraid it's a dream come true...

9.「むむっ。レンダーシアのカードに | スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！|<:
... I see you have stamped all the cards in|Lendermere! Your work here in Lendershya has|reached my ears... On behalf of all who live|
|in Lendershya, I would like to thank you... I really appreciate it.

10.「おお なんと！ レンダーシアⅡのカードに | スタンプが すべて 押されたよう:
Oh, my! It seems that all the stamps have|been applied to the cards of Lenderia II! At|this point, it would not be an exaggeration|
|to say that your work has preserved order in|Lendencia! We are not to be outdone...|However, in order to lead Rendershia to a|
|better path, we must continue to rely on your|help...

11.「おおっ レンダーシアⅢのカードに| スタンプが すべて 押されたようではないか:
Oh, it looks like all the stamps have been|applied to the cards of Lendermere III! What|a wonderful thing! Perhaps I should call you|
|the savior of Lendermere from now on... My|eyes were right when I entrusted you with the|stamp card... I think I'm getting a little|
|high!

12.アリオス王は レンダーシアカードに|スタンプを ひとつ 押した！|<end>: King Arios put a single stamp on the|Lendersian card!<end>
